creator: lmeyer@vmware.com
text:
Created attachment 26939
Patch against 2.2.x/docs/manual/mod

As discussed briefly with docs (April 5), this is a suggested change to give brief usage for mod_proxy_ajp and help bury the cargo-culted unnecessary ProxyPassReverse that often goes with it. I add a usage section at the front of the module with this information. See patch attached. This can presumably also be applied against trunk.

Applied to 2.2 in r1199557 and to trunk in r1199554.

Thanks.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
